## ğŸ® How to Start Playing

1. **Install Vivecraft mod** on client according to instructions on [official website](https://www.vivecraft.org/)
2. **Connect VR headset** to computer
3. **Launch Minecraft** with installed mod
4. **Connect to server** `overnight.wilderion.ru`

:::tip Tip
On first launch, Vivecraft may require setup. Follow instructions in-game or on the official website.
:::

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**Which VR headsets are supported?**</summary>

Vivecraft supports most popular VR headsets, including Oculus, HTC Vive, Valve Index, and others. See full compatibility list on the official website.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Do I need to install anything on the server?**</summary>

No, the plugin is already installed on Overnight server. You only need to install the mod on client.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Can I play without VR?**</summary>

Yes, Vivecraft mod can be used without VR headset, but VR is recommended for full experience.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Does it work with other mods?**</summary>

Vivecraft is compatible with many mods, but not all. Check compatibility on official website or forum.

</details>
